headline: California Judge Signals Abuse Settlement Approval
abstract: More than 18,000 women are expected to receive $2,500 to $250,000 from the University of Southern California.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Los Angeles said this week that he was inclined to give final approval to the University of Southern Californiaâ€™s $215 million class-action settlement with former patients of Dr. George Tyndall, the campus gynecologist accused of sexual misconduct involving hundreds of patients during his decades-long tenure.
